name: Storm Herald
description: Barbarians who channel the fury of nature into a magical storm that surrounds them.

3.name: Storm Aura
3.description: While raging, you emanate a 10-foot aura chosen from desert, sea, or tundra, creating effects when you rage and as a bonus action.

6.name: Storm Soul
6.description: Gain benefits even when your aura isn't active, based on your chosen environment such as resistance to fire, lightning, or cold and related abilities.

10.name: Shielding Storm
10.description: Each creature of your choice in your Storm Aura gains the damage resistance provided by your Storm Soul.

14.name: Raging Storm
14.description: Your aura lashes out at foes with effects based on your environment, such as burning attackers or knocking enemies prone.

choices.name: Storm Herald Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Storm Herald subclass
